mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id,t.user_id,u.phonenumber,u.nickname, t.task_title,t.task_content,t.task_type,t.task_status, t.personal,t.like_peas,t.lottery_type,t.hot, t.quantity,t.sale_price,t.sale_amount,t.lock_time, t.settle_coins,t.settle_time,t.create_date, a2.answer_id,a2.answer,a2.odds,a2.is_right, f.tfb_id,f.team_name,f.court_type, p.pic_id,p.pic_url,p.pic_type, o.user_id answerUserId,u2.nickname userName,o.answer_id userAnswer,a.answer userAnswerName,a.is_right answer_right,o.total FROM t_tasks t JOIN m_users u on t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_task_football f on f.task_id = t.task_id and f.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_pictures p on p.task_id = t.task_id and p.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id,task_id,answer_id,COUNT(1) total FROM t_task_orders GROUP BY user_id,task_id,answer_id) o on o.task_id = t.task_id LEFT JOIN m_users u2 on u2.user_id = o.user_id LEFT JOIN t_task_answers a on a.answer_id = o.answer_id and a.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_answers a2 on a2.task_id = t.task_id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.task_id = #{taskId}

SELECT t.task_id,t.user_id,u.phonenumber,u.nickname, t.task_title,t.task_content,t.task_type,t.task_status, t.personal,t.like_peas,t.lottery_type,t.hot, t.quantity,t.sale_price,t.sale_amount,t.lock_time, t.settle_coins,t.settle_time,t.create_date, a.answer_id,a.answer,a.odds, f.tfb_id,f.team_name,f.court_type, p.pic_id,p.pic_url,p.pic_type FROM t_tasks t JOIN m_users u on t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_task_answers a on a.task_id = t.task_id and a.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_football f on f.task_id = t.task_id and f.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_pictures p on p.task_id = t.task_id and p.is_delete = 0 WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.task_id = #{taskId}
SELECT lottery_type FROM t_tasks WHERE is_delete = 0 AND task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_tasks SET task_status = #{taskStatus}, settle_time = #{settleTime}, settle_time = #{settleTime}, settle_coins = #{settleCoins}, lottery_result = #{lotteryResult}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE task_id =#{taskId}
UPDATE t_tasks SET lock_time = current_timestamp, update_date = current_timestamp WHERE task_id =#{taskId}
UPDATE t_tasks SET is_recommend=1, update_date = current_timestamp WHERE task_id =#{taskId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id,t.user_id,u.phonenumber,u.nickname, t.task_title,t.task_content,t.task_type,t.task_status,t.hot,t.lottery_type, t.quantity,t.sale_price,t.sale_amount,t.lock_time, t.settle_coins,t.settle_time,t.create_date, a.answer_id,a.answer,a.odds, f.tfb_id,f.team_name,f.court_type, p.pic_id,p.pic_url,p.pic_type FROM t_tasks t JOIN m_users u on t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_task_answers a on a.task_id = t.task_id and a.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_football f on f.task_id = t.task_id and f.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_pictures p on p.task_id = t.task_id and p.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN (select task_id, sum(quantity) qty from t_task_orders where is_delete =0 group by task_id) od on od.task_id = t.task_id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.task_status = 20 -- 手动开奖的竞猜超时后 没有正确答案也需要自动开奖（平分金币），有正确答案的超时未开奖的需要尝试开奖 AND (t.lottery_type = 1 OR exists(select 1 from t_task_answers ans where ans.task_id = t.task_id and ans.is_right = 1)) AND (t.settle_time < current_timestamp or od.qty = t.quantity)
select match_id,match_type,play_type from t_tasks where task_id=#{taskId}
select count(1) cnt from t_task_answers a left join t_tasks b on a.task_id=b.task_id left join t_matches c on b.match_id=c.match_id where a.task_id=#{taskId} and a.is_right=1 and c.status=3
select home_score,away_score from t_matches where match_id=#{matchId}
select concede_points from t_tasks where task_id=#{taskId}

select b.task_id from t_matches a left join t_tasks b on a.match_id=b.match_id and a.status=3 left join t_task_answers c on b.task_id=c.task_id and c.is_right=1 GROUP BY a.match_id,b.task_id,c.answer_id having b.task_id is not null and c.answer_id is null
